notes.text:
This update for djvulibre fixes the following issues:
	  
- CVE-2019-18804: Fixed a null pointer dereference (bsc#1156188).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: DjVuLibre 3.5.27 has a NULL pointer dereference in the function DJVU::filter_fv at IW44EncodeCodec.cpp.
notes.title: CVE description
